title: Foundational Numerical Analysis Education Design Utilizing Flipped Learning and Adaptive Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Basic arithmetic skills and problem-solving reasoning abilities
context.additional_context: A blended learning course for pre-service and in-service teachers using VR simulations and LMS, structured around case studies of numerical analysis applications in social contexts.

learning_goals: Learners can explain fundamental concepts of numerical analysis with 80% or higher accuracy using adaptive content in a flipped learning environment
Learners can simulate the application of numerical analysis techniques to real-world social issues (e.g., population distribution analysis) using VR simulation tools
Learners identify individual learning gaps through formative assessments and implement 90% or more of the personalized learning paths suggested by adaptive feedback
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
